field.name: summary
field.value: Cannot use Controller.Redirect()/RedirectToAction() with extensionless actions

field.name: description
field.value:
Monorail must be using extensionless actions, e.g. <add verb="*" path="*" type="Castle.MonoRail.Framework.MonoRailHttpHandlerFactory, Castle.MonoRail.Framework" />.
When using Controller.Redirect() (any signature produces the same result) to send a user to a new controller and action, or just a new action within the current controller, the URL has a trailing dot ".".
For instance, I redirect to a controller named "foo" and its action "bar". The resulting URL generated by the Controller.Redirect() method would be "/foo/bar.". Controller.RedirectToAction produces the same erroneous URL.
